snippet: Once a vital guide for new immigrants, the Korean American Association of Greater New York has become largely ceremonial, but prestige comes with its presidency.
abstract: Korean American Assn of Greater New York, one of oldest Korean community groups in region, is embroiled in battle for leadership tinged with accusations of financial malfeasance, election fraud and trespassing.

byline.original: By KIRK SEMPLE and JIHA HAM

lead_paragraph: Once a vital guide for new immigrants, the Korean American Association of Greater New York has become largely ceremonial, but prestige comes with its presidency.

headline.main: With Break-In, Seeking to Change Locks and Leadership at a New York Korean Group
headline.print_headline: With Break-In, Seeking to Change Locks and Leadership at a Korean Group

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Korean-American Assn of Greater New York
